title: Large-Scale Context-Based Personalized Mathematics Learning Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts (addition, subtraction, multiplication) and practical math application experience
context.additional_context: Customized math task design leveraging learners' interests (sports, music, games, etc.).

learning_goals: Learners can solve real-world problems connected to their areas of interest through mathematical modeling.
Learners can explain the application process of mathematical principles through context-based tasks.
Learners can revise and supplement personalized learning outcomes through peer feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
